title: Citi Guatemala Presents Its New Citi Super MultiPremios Credit Card, Which Allows Users to Earn Miles at All of the Country's Supermarkets
summary: Guatemala City, Guatemala - Citi Guatemala announced today the launch of its new Citi Súper MultiPremios credit card as part of its commitment to innovation and offering new financial products and solutions to its clients in Guatemala.
tag-1: Citi Guatemala Presents Its New Citi Super MultiPremios Credit Card, Which Allows Users to Earn Miles at All of the Country's Supermarkets
tag-3: Guatemala City, Guatemala – Citi Guatemala announced today the launch of its new Citi Súper MultiPremios credit card as part of its commitment to innovation and offering new financial products and solutions to its clients in Guatemala.
tag-4: The new Citi Súper MultiPremios Visa card offers 5 MultiPremios Miles for each dollar (or the equivalent in quetzales) in purchases at all of the country's supermarkets, and 1 MultiPremios Mile for every dollar spent at other establishments in Guatemala and abroad. As a welcome gift, card users will earn 10 MultiPremios Miles for each dollar in supermarket purchases for the first two months after they sign up.
tag-5: "At Citi, we want to offer our clients simple and innovative solutions. That's why this card's main benefit is the ability to earn MultiPremios Miles at EVERY supermarket in the country. It doesn't matter which supermarket; our clients will always earn MultiPremios miles that can be redeemed for gifts, prizes or travel or credited toward paying off their account balance," commented Luis Fernando Gómez, Products and Segments Director at Citi Guatemala.
tag-6: MultiPremios is Citi's leading and most dynamic loyalty program, offering MultiPremios miles for all purchases and the ability to redeem them for gifts, travel and cash. There are several different ways to redeem MultiPremios miles, allowing clients can choose the one that best meets their needs: directly at the POS of VisaNet-affiliated establishments; by calling Citiphone 1724; by exchanging MultiPremios for LifeMiles; or crediting them toward their account balance as if they were cash.

tag-8: "We are committed to offering our clients in Guatemala banking products adapted to their lifestyles. The Citi Súper MultiPremios card with built-in chip offers benefits as well as more secure transactions", added Bernardo Chacín, General Manager of Citi Guatemala.
tag-9: For more information about how to obtain the unique and exclusive Citi Súper MultiPremios credit card and product conditions and restrictions, please call 1724 or visit any Citi branch.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
